title: Da Zhentan Xiongmao Zhu
synopsis: Rongchang and Yuanyuan live in the city of Rongchang. Together with Little Swan Gebai, Little Lion, Little Turtle and Little Niu Huahua, they lived in Changzhou Kindergarten and grew up happily under the care of the grandfather of the Panda Garden. Rongrong, who loves reasoning, and Yuanyuan, who loves reasoning, and Yuanyuan, who is passionate and righteous, have always cherished the heroic dream of eliminating harm for the people. They formed a pair of partners and used scientific knowledge and nuanced observation and analysis to embark on the coveted road of chivalrous exploration. Rongchang Xiaoxia Detective". (translated from iqiyi)
